===============================================================================
  QUICK START GUIDE
===============================================================================

FIRST TIME SETUP:
-----------------
1. Add your airport files to the "airport_data" folder:
   - [AIRPORT].geojson (e.g., KPHX.geojson)
   - [AIRPORT]_CIFP.txt (e.g., KPHX_CIFP.txt)

2. (Optional) Edit config.json to set airline parking preferences

3. Double-click SSG.exe to launch


GENERATING SCENARIOS:
---------------------
1. Launch SSG.exe
2. Select your airport from the list
3. Choose scenario type and parameters
4. Click Generate
5. Save your scenario file


FOLDER CONTENTS:
----------------
SSG.exe         - Main application (double-click to run)
config.json     - Airline parking configuration
airport_data/   - Place your airport files here
logs/           - Application logs (created on first run)


NEED HELP?
----------
Check README.txt for detailed instructions
